author: Frances Taylor
title: Apple Tree Yard's shocking third episode has fans itching for series finale
text:
Twitter Apple Tree Yard's shocking third episode has fans itching for series finale Emily Watson continues to be amazing in the BBC1 drama, with the final episode set to air this Monday night   Frances Taylor 
Apple Tree Yard viewers were going to bed with a lot of questions last night. 
The BBC1 drama‚Äôs third shocking episode aired on Sunday night, with Yvonne (Emily Watson) being arrested for murder and fans left asking ‚ÄòWho is Mark Costley?‚Äô. 
However, we don‚Äôt have much longer to wait as the fourth and final episode airs tonight at 9pm . Which was welcome relief to those who couldn‚Äôt bear to wait any longer‚Ä¶ The fact that #AppleTreeYard is on again in less than 24 hours. I really appreciate that. pic.twitter.com/q1SLUeIMLJ ‚Äî Ruby Brown (@ruby_brown4) February 5, 2017 @mark_bonnar I mean what amazing acting by you all tonight absolutely love apple tree yard can't wait for tomorrow's episode ‚úåüèªÔ∏è x
